title: OpenTox - the creation of a Semantic Web for Toxicology
segmentation: I'm very happy to be here in Ljubljana and and to talk about open types, which is a project I've been coordinating now for almost three years.
We reach three years on tomorrow and so I really want to just tell you this story.

What could we do with it in the future?

On so in this project, which is being funded as an FP7 project, we've basically created an open semantic, interoperable computing architecture in these three years for predictive toxicology, and I'll call that say, open Tax 1.0.
